revision.text:
<languages/> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Exeggutor Island Hill |image = [[File:Exeggutor Island Hill.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Exeggutor Island Hill. |tokens = 1,100,000 |location = Exeggutor Island }}
'''Exeggutor Island Hill''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 121 tiles arranged in a 11x11 square, including 11 chest tiles, 41 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 15,773,066 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Exeggcute.png|40px]] Exeggcute ||rowspan=3 colspan=2|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Pelipper.png|40px]] Pelipper |- | [[File:Gastrodon (east).png|40px]] Gastrodon (east) |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Pinsir.png|50px]] Pinsir ||rowspan=2|<center>78,865,330 ||rowspan=2 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Tropius.png|50px]] Tropius |- |}
==Items==
